DONATE

The Spanish word dignidad can be translated as both pride and self-esteem. Both meanings drive Repertorio’s education efforts. Since its beginning, Repertorio Español has committed its resources to making theatre accessible and part of the classroom experience with the aim of instilling cultural pride, promoting self-awareness, divulging the riches of Spanish-language theatre.

CONTESTS

The Company offers FOUR student contests
